txt_en: Life is about making an impact, not making an income.
txt_cn: 生命在于影响他人，而非赚钱糊口。
author: Kevin Kruse

txt_en: It's faith that will take you through, and determination that will drive you.
txt_cn: 信念带你渡过难关，决心为你加油鼓劲。
author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett

txt_en: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
txt_cn: 无需等待就可行动起来，让世界变得更美好——这简直妙不可言！
author: Anne Frank

txt_en: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
txt_cn: 总要竭尽全力。你播种什么，就会收获什么。
author: Og Mandino

txt_en: Why bother to sigh for my clean coat to be smeared? It’s not late to be home for Clear and Bright Festival.
txt_cn: 素衣莫起风尘叹，犹及清明可到家。（黄新渠译）
author: 陆游《临安春雨初霁》

txt_en: Just do the best you can. No one can do more than that.
txt_cn: 唯有竭尽全力，此外别无他法。
author: John Wooden

txt_en: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
txt_cn: 我们中有太多人没有践行自己的梦想，因为我们活在担心惧怕中。
author: Les Brown

txt_en: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
txt_cn: 我们不能帮助所有人，但每个人都能帮到别人。
author: Ronald Reagan

txt_en: If I am walking with two other men, each of them will serve as my teacher.
author: Confucius

txt_en: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any one thing.
txt_cn: 时刻牢记，渴望成功的决心比任何事情都重要。
author: Abraham Lincoln

txt_cn: 细心和勤奋能带来好运。
author: Thomas Fuller

txt_en: It takes a great deal of courage to stand up to your enemies, but a great deal more to stand up to your friends.
txt_cn: 要挺身而出对抗敌人的确需要很大的勇气，但要挺身而出反抗朋友却需要更大的勇气。
author: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

txt_en: Leave nothing for tomorrow which can be done today.
txt_cn: 今天能做的，就不要拖到明天。
author: Abraham Lincoln

txt_en: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
txt_cn: 如果你说实话，就不必刻意记住任何事。
author: Mark Twain

txt_en: Two wrongs don't make a right, but they make a good excuse.
txt_cn: 两个人都犯了错不能把事情变成对的，但能成为一个好借口。
author: Thomas Szasz

txt_en: Life's most persistent and urgent question is "What are you doing for others?"
txt_cn: 生命中最永恒和急迫的问题便是：你能为别人做些什么？
author: Martin Luther King

txt_en: It is not beauty that endears, it's love that makes us see beauty.
txt_cn: 并非美丽招人爱，而是爱让我们看到了美丽。
author: Leo Tolstoy

txt_en: I think of a hero as someone who understands the degree of responsibility that comes with his freedom.
txt_cn: 我认为，英雄是懂得责任和自由同在的人。
author: Bob Dylan
